00006 ** GL_ATI_fragment_shader
00007 **
00008 ** Support:
00009 **   Rage 128 * based  : Not Supported
00010 **   Radeon   * based  : Not Supported

00012 **   R200 : 8500, 9000, 9100, 9200
00013 **   also works on R300 but pointless since ARBFP1.0 supported
00014 */
